meanings.definition: Relating to or in the style of Capri, an island in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The colorful and vibrant caprese decorations at the party added a touch of Italian flair.
meanings.sent2: The caprese villa was painted in bright hues reminiscent of the Mediterranean coast.
meanings.sent3: The caprese-themed birthday cake was a hit, with tiny edible palm trees and beach umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: Her caprese outfit made her stand out in the crowd, like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The caprese sunset painted the sky in hues of orange, pink, and purple, creating a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: A salad made with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, olive oil, and sometimes balsamic vinegar.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, she enjoyed a delicious caprese with ripe tomatoes and creamy mozzarella.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's signature dish was a flavorful caprese drizzled with olive oil.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the caprese accidentally toppled over, creating a messy but tasty mishap.
meanings.sent4: The caprese on the menu was a symphony of flavors, a perfect harmony of ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fresh basil in the caprese filled the room, enticing everyone to take a bite.
